bear: {svg <?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8' standalone='no'?><svg xmlns:svg='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' version='1.1'  style='enable-background:new 0 0 40 20;' id='svg2' xml:space='preserve'  viewBox='-200 200 400 400' width='400' height='400'><g transform='translate(0,400)'><g transform='scale(1,-1)'>#background##bearEars##bearHead##bearEyes##bearMouth##bearNose#</g></g></svg>}
bearEars: <g transform='rotate(#rotation#)'><circle id='left ear' cx='-12#digit#' cy='6#digit#' r='4#digit#' stroke='#color#' stroke-width='#digit#' fill='#color#' /><circle id='right ear' cx='12#digit#' cy='6#digit#' r='4#digit#' stroke='#color#' stroke-width='#digit#' fill='#color#' /></g>
bearHead: <g transform='rotate(#rotation#)'><circle id='head' cx='0' cy='0' r='12#digit#' stroke='#color#' stroke-width='#digit#' fill='#color#' /><circle id='muzzle' cx='0' cy='-50' r='60' stroke='#color#' stroke-width='#digit#' fill='#color#' /></g>
bearNose: <g transform='rotate(#rotation#)'><polygon id='nose' points='0,-45 -20,-20 20,-20' stroke='#color#' stroke-width='#digit#' fill='#color#' /></g>
bearEyes: <g transform='rotate(#rotation#)'><circle id='left eye' cx='-50' cy='40' r='2#digit#' stroke='#color#' stroke-width='#digit#' fill='#color#' /><circle id='right eye' cx='50' cy='40' r='2#digit#' stroke='#color#' stroke-width='#digit#' fill='#color#' /></g>
bearMouth: <g stroke='#color#' transform='rotate(#rotation#)'>><path id='left mouth' d='M -2 -50 q 10 -40 -36 -20'  stroke-width='8' fill='none' /><path id='left mouth' d='M 2 -50 q -10 -40 36 -20'  stroke-width='8' fill='none' /></g>
robot: {svg <?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8' standalone='no'?><svg xmlns:svg='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' version='1.1'  style='enable-background:new 0 0 40 20;' id='svg2' xml:space='preserve'  viewBox='-200 200 400 400' width='400' height='400'><g transform='translate(0,400)'><g transform='scale(1,-1)'><g transform='rotate(0)'>#background##antenna##roboEars##roboHead##roboMouth##roboNose##roboEyes#</g></g></g></svg>}
antenna: <g transform='rotate(#rotation#)'><rect id='antenna' x='-4' y='120' width='#digit#' height='50' fill='gray' /><circle id='antenna top' cx='0' cy='16#digit#' r='#digit#' stroke='#color#' stroke-width='#digit#' fill='#color#' /></g>
roboEars: <circle id='left ear' cx='-12#digit#' cy='20' r='4#digit#' stroke='#color#' stroke-width='#digit#' fill='#color#' /><circle id='right ear' cx='12#digit#' cy='20' r='4#digit#' stroke='#color#' stroke-width='#digit#' fill='#color#' />
roboHead: <g transform='rotate(#rotation#)'><rect id='head' x='-164' y='-164' rx='#digit#' ry='#digit#' width='328' height='296'  stroke='#color#' stroke-width='#digit#' fill='gray' /></g>
roboMouth: <g transform='rotate(#rotation#)'><rect id='mouth' x='-146' y='-150' width='28#digit#' height='10#digit#' stroke='#color#' stroke-width='#digit#' fill='#color#' rx='#digit#' ry='#digit#' /><polyline id='teeth' points='-140,-8#digit# -120,-4#digit# -100,-#digit##digit# -80,-#digit##digit# -60,-#digit##digit# -40,-#digit##digit# -20,-#digit##digit# 20,-#digit##digit# 40,-#digit##digit# 60,-#digit##digit# 80,-#digit##digit# 100,-#digit##digit# 120,-4#digit# 140,-8#digit#' fill='silver' /></g>
roboNose: <rect id='nose' x='-2#digit#' y='-20' width='4#digit#' height='6#digit#' stroke='#color#' stroke-width='#digit#' fill='#color#' transform = 'rotate(#digit##digit##digit# 0 26)'/>
roboEyes: <g transform='rotate(#rotation#)'><circle id='left eye' cx='-8#digit#' cy='60' r='4#digit#' stroke='#color#' stroke-width='#digit#' fill='#color#' /><circle id='right eye' cx='8#digit#' cy='60' r='4#digit#' stroke='#color#' stroke-width='#digit#' fill='#color#' /></g>
flower: {svg <?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8' standalone='no'?><svg xmlns:svg='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' version='1.1'  style='enable-background:new 0 0 40 20;' id='svg2' xml:space='preserve'  viewBox='-200 200 400 400' width='400' height='400'><g transform='translate(0,400)'><g transform='scale(1,-1)'>#background##pedals##face#</g></g></svg>}
pedals: <g transform='rotate(#digit##digit##digit##digit#)'><ellipse cx='0' cy='0' rx='2#digit#' ry='180' fill='#color#' transform = 'rotate(0 0 0)'/><ellipse cx='0' cy='0' rx='2#digit#' ry='180' fill='#color#' transform = 'rotate(30 0 0)'/><ellipse cx='0' cy='0' rx='2#digit#' ry='180' fill='#color#' transform = 'rotate(60 0 0)'/><ellipse cx='0' cy='0' rx='2#digit#' ry='180' fill='#color#' transform = 'rotate(90 0 0)'/><ellipse cx='0' cy='0' rx='2#digit#' ry='180' fill='#color#' transform = 'rotate(120 0 0)'/><ellipse cx='0' cy='0' rx='2#digit#' ry='180' fill='#color#' transform = 'rotate(150 0 0)'/></g>
face: <g transform='rotate(#rotation#)'><circle id='head' r='80' stroke='#color#' stroke-width='6' fill='#color#' /><path id='left eye' d='M -40 20 q 16 20 32 0' stroke='silver' stroke-width='6' fill='none' /><path id='right eye' d='M 40 20 q -16 20 -32 0' stroke='silver' stroke-width='6' fill='none' /><path id='mouth' d='M -48 -16 q 48 -56 96 0' fill='silver' /></g>
bunny: {svg <?xml version='1.0' encoding='UTF-8' standalone='no'?><svg xmlns:svg='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' version='1.1'  style='enable-background:new 0 0 40 20;' id='svg2' xml:space='preserve'  viewBox='-200 200 400 400' width='400' height='400'><g transform='translate(0,400)'><g transform='scale(1,-1)'>#background##bunnyEars##bunnyHead##bunnyEyes##bunnyMouth##bunnyNose#</g></g></svg>}
bunnyEars: <g transform='rotate(#rotation#)'><ellipse id='left ear' cx='-7#digit#' cy='80' rx='3#digit#' ry='7#digit#' stroke='#color#' stroke-width='#digit#' fill='#color#' transform='rotate(22 -110 80)'/><ellipse id='right ear' cx='7#digit#' cy='80' rx='3#digit#' ry='7#digit#' stroke='#color#' stroke-width='#digit#' fill='#color#' transform='rotate(-22 110 80)' /></g>
bunnyHead: <circle id='head' cx='0' cy='-60' r='11#digit#' stroke='#color#' stroke-width='#digit#' fill='#color#' />

bunnyMouth: <g stroke='#color#' stroke-width='#digit#' transform='rotate(#rotation#)'><path id='left mouth' d='M -2 -100 q 10 -40 -36 -20'  fill='none' /><path id='left mouth' d='M 2 -100 q -10 -40 36 -20'  fill='none' /></g>
